name: Deeply Dark
description:
Survive on Nibiru
Dive into the role of Shado, a corrupt and exiled young Nibirian, learn how to get food and materials to build tools, and survive in the different places of this dark planet while recovering your memory about your past and the mysterious gauntlet you are wearing.

Enter your deepest dreams
When you sleep you must solve the mysteries that abound in your mind to purify the corruption that is within you

Use the power of colors
Face your worst nightmares strategically using the different combat styles that gives you the power of the colors of the legendary gauntlet,
Increase your knowledge and empower your armor to equip artifacts with unique abilities that will help you banish specters.

How many days do you think you can survive?
Find out and don't fall deeply dark.
